artist: Artist: John Smith; Manufacturer: Minton and Company
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of C.J. Hudgins
description: transfer image in tan, brown, grey and white; woman wearing a shawl over her head at left, with an elegantly dressed man on her left, meets two leadies wearing ruffled dresses and hats
markings: [HEART OF/MID-/LOTHIAN], printed at upper left corner; [MOYR SMITH CH.XXXVII JEANIE & THE QUEEN], printed along bottom edge; [MINTONS/CHINA WORKS/STOKE ON TRENT], stamped, on bottom
portfolio: From Based on Sir Walter Scott's 'The Heart of Midlothian'
title: "Jeanie and the Queen" tile
